Body:
sciimg = np.ones((1000, 1000)).astype(float)
left = np.full((1000, 3), 2, dtype=float)
right = np.full((1000, 3), 8, dtype=float)
left[:, (1)] = 15.0
right[:, (1)] = 21.0
left[:, (2)] = 25.0
right[:, (2)] = 31.0
slits = slittrace.SlitTraceSet(left, right, 'MultiSlit', nspat=1000,
    PYP_SPEC='dummy')
sdict = dict(sciimg=sciimg, ivarraw=0.1 * np.ones_like(sciimg), skymodel=
    0.95 * np.ones_like(sciimg), objmodel=np.ones_like(sciimg), ivarmodel=
    0.05 * np.ones_like(sciimg), waveimg=1000 * np.ones_like(sciimg),
    bpmmask=np.ones_like(sciimg).astype(int), det=1, detector=None, slits=
    slits, tilts=np.ones_like(sciimg).astype(float), sci_spat_flexure=3.5)
return sdict
